com.gemalto.idp.mobile.securestorage

Class SecureStorageModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.securestorage.SecureStorageModule

  • public class SecureStorageModule
extends java.lang.Object
    SecureStorageModule class which is the entry-point for SecureStorage features.
    Since:
    4.0

        Cleanup the data associated with given storageIdentifier.
        Parameters:

      • isMigrationNeededForAndroidQ

        public boolean isMigrationNeededForAndroidQ(java.lang.String storageIdentifier,
                                            DeviceFingerprintSource dfs)
                                     throws IdpSecureStorageException
        Check if the migration is needed for Android Q with the given storage identifier. If the migration is needed, app should ask the end user for the permission READ_PHONE_STATE and then call the migration API migrateForAndroidQ(String, DeviceFingerprintSource).

        NOTE: This API should be called during the application startup to make sure that the permission popup, if any, will not interfere with other business flow.

        For more information on Android Q privacy changes, refer to https://developer.android.com/preview/privacy/data-identifiers#device-ids

        Parameters:
        storageIdentifier - The storage identifier need to be checked.
        dfs - The device fingerprint source.
        Returns:
        true if migration is needed, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        IdpSecureStorageException - When database operation failed.
        Since:
        4.9.2
        See Also:
        migrateForAndroidQ(String, DeviceFingerprintSource)

      • migrateForAndroidQ

        public void migrateForAndroidQ(java.lang.String storageIdentifier,
                               DeviceFingerprintSource dfs)
                        throws IdpSecureStorageException
        Migrate the old secure storage data to be compatible with Android Q. In order to retrieve the old data, this API needs the READ_PHONE_STATE permission to be granted. After the migration, the permission is not required anymore.

        For more information on Android Q privacy changes, refer to https://developer.android.com/preview/privacy/data-identifiers#device-ids

        Parameters:
        storageIdentifier - The name of the storage to be migrated.
        dfs - The device fingerprint source.
        Throws:
        IdpSecureStorageException - When database operation failed.
        Since:
        4.9.2
        See Also:
        isMigrationNeededForAndroidQ(String, DeviceFingerprintSource)
